1496200.name: Project Amalthea: Campaign
1496200.description:
Project Amalthea: Campaign allows you to explore huge location surrounding Amalthea 2 orbital station in 15+ hours single player campaign.

All owners of this DLC will receive 10 Starcoins and access to Assassin class as a gift.

Now you can explore vast new world on your own or with friends! Moreover all the PvP content is still here: you can enlist to various Battlegrounds as well while visiting one of three key stations in the region. There you can choose a path of a noble pirate and move entirely to Las Tortugas station, ambush other players and smuggle goods. Extended reputation system allows you to choose your side and follow the quests for one of the factions while reputation with other factions slowly decrease. Killing players and taking their belongings is a part of a gameplay!
And also we have all-new Assassin class that uses Stealth mode to avoid enemies or ambush its opponents!




Key features:
  • 15 hours storyline with 60 various quests
  • 3 main space stations with different reputations, trade goods and quests
  • unlimited amount of errands on every station
  • various bosses, elite guards and hostile factions
  • attacking players lowers your reputation with NPC faction
  • part of player cargo is dropped from the hold on death
  • lots of other MMO features: item durability and repairs, earning talent points, finding quest-starting artifacts, etc!
